__e: The gaze of one member of the audience bothered me.
There was a time -- a glorious, halcyon time when no one bothered me down here. Not a soul. Now it's like Grand Central Station.
He distracted me at the worst possible moment, Grace.
He was distracted for a few minutes.

Someplace where not too many people would bother you.
I'm sorry, I feel like I interrupted you.
Well, first of all... please let me apologize again for disturbing you at this hour, Mr...
Do you remember when I came in here yesterday without an appointment and interrupted your session with another patient?
If it had been about the bank I wouldn't have interrupted your party, an uninvited guest.
Sorry, did I interrupt you from trying to eat your baby?
And I really thought I hit the jackpot when I finally met a woman who was as disturbed and closed off as I am.
